name: Drawnana
description:
'Member the good old days of drawing on your banana? Turn back the hands of time and let nostalgia wrap itself around you like a blanket in this fun-for-everyone game for people aged 0-100!

Play the game in the browser or download together with Scratch 1.4: https://scratch.mit.edu/scratch_1.4/

I hope you have a good time playing this funny face maker. All sound effects are 100% genuine banana sounds made by Oscar 'Soundproof' Rydelius ( https://soundcloud.com/soundproof-or ). Drawnana was made for the #BANANAJAM 2017.

Thank you for reading.

/Kjell Håftén
